metadata.title: ELSA-2023-4644:  .NET 6.0 security, bug fix, and enhancement update (IMPORTANT)
metadata.description:
[6.0.121-1.0.1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.121 and Runtime 6.0.21
- Resolves: RHBZ#2228567

[6.0.120-1.0.1]
- Add missing Oracle Linux Runtime IDs

[6.0.120-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.120 and Runtime 6.0.20
- Resolves: RHBZ#2219637

[6.0.119-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.119 and Runtime 6.0.19
- Resolves: RHBZ#2216220

[6.0.118-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.118 and Runtime 6.0.18
- Resolves: RHBZ#2212379

[6.0.117-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.117 and Runtime 6.0.17
- Resolves: RHBZ#2190264

[6.0.116-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.116 and Runtime 6.0.16
- Resolves: RHBZ#2183582

[6.0.115-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.115 and Runtime 6.0.15
- Resolves: RHBZ#2174981

[6.0.114-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.114 and Runtime 6.0.14
- Resolves: RHBZ#2166767

[6.0.113-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.113 and Runtime 6.0.13
- Resolves: RHBZ#2154457

[6.0.112-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.112 and Runtime 6.0.12
- Resolves: RHBZ#2150146

[6.0.111-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.111 and Runtime 6.0.11
- Resolves: RHBZ#2138278

[6.0.110-2]
- Fix build with newer versions of clang
- Related: RHBZ#2131326

[6.0.110-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.110 and Runtime 6.0.10
- Resolves: RHBZ#2131326

[6.0.109-3]
- Disable packages now produced by another SRPM
- Related: RHBZ#2123788

[6.0.109-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.109 and Runtime 6.0.9
- Resolves: RHBZ#2123788

[6.0.108-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.108 and Runtime 6.0.8
- Resolves: RHBZ#2112409

[6.0.107-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.107 and Runtime 6.0.7
- Resolves: RHBZ#2103269

[6.0.106-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.106 and Runtime 6.0.6
- Resolves: RHBZ#2093431

[6.0.105-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.105 and Runtime 6.0.5
- Resolves: RHBZ#2082266

[6.0.104-1]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.104 and Runtime 6.0.4
- Resolves: RHBZ#2078604

[6.0.103-2]
- Update to .NET SDK 6.0.103 and Runtime 6.0.3
- Resolves: RHBZ#2072015

[6.0.102-3]
- Disable bootstrap
- Related: RHBZ#1986211

[6.0.100-2]
- Rebuild and check SDK to avoid an incomplete SDK
- Related: RHBZ#1986211

[6.0.100-1]
- Update to .NET 6
- Resolves: RHBZ#1986211

[6.0.0-0.7.rc2]
- Update to .NET 6 RC2

[6.0.0-0.6.28be3e9a006d90d8c6e87d4353b77882829df718]
- Enable building on arm64
- Related: RHBZ#1986017

[6.0.0-0.5.28be3e9a006d90d8c6e87d4353b77882829df718]
- Enable building on s390x
- Related: RHBZ#1986017

[6.0.0-0.4.28be3e9a006d90d8c6e87d4353b77882829df718]
- Clean up tarball and add initial support for s390x
- Related: RHBZ#1986017

[6.0.0-0.3.28be3e9a006d90d8c6e87d4353b77882829df718]
- Update to work-in-progress RC2 release

[6.0.0-0.2.preview6]
- Updated to build the latest source-build preview
